passerine=01527000-n (perching birds mostly small and living near the ground with feet having 4 toes arranged to allow for gripping the perch; most are songbirds; hatchlings are helpless);02785836-a (relating to or characteristic of the passeriform birds)

senses.definition: A small passerine bird of the genus ''Lalage'' belonging to the cuckoo-shrike family Campephagidae, so called because of the loud trilling calls of the male birds
